trans-unit.source: We sincerely apologize, but there seems to be a technical issue with starting your consult. We've already pinged our top engineers to investigate and resolve the issue. If you need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our Quality Care Team at support@healthtap.com. If you cannot start your consult in time, we will fully re-credit your account. (Error code: %{error})
trans-unit.target: 我们真诚地向您道歉，但是开始您的咨询似乎遇到了一个问题。我们已经联系了我们的顶尖工程师以调查并解决问题。如需进一步帮助，请联系我们的质量保证团队support@healthtap.com。如果您无法及时开始咨询，我们将完全重新记入您的帐户。（错误代码：%{error})

trans-unit.source: We're sorry but you must be 18 years or older to start a Virtual Consult with a doctor. We can't start your consult at this time. trans-unit.source: Growing your network of patient and peers
trans-unit.target: 壮大您的患者和同行网络

trans-unit.source: Responding to messages in a manner respectful of time
trans-unit.target: 在合理的时间回复消息

trans-unit.source: Agree with answers from other doctors
Invite doctors and patients to HealthTap
Add other doctors to your network
trans-unit.target: 向您的网络添加其他医生

trans-unit.source: Select "Known for" topics by clicking on the "edit" link in the field below your photo and name on the Virtual Practice home page - you can choose up to 5 "Known for" topics that will direct patients and questions to your profile that are related to those topics. (see more about “Known For” topics here)
trans-unit.target: 通过点击在线诊疗主页上照片和名称下面的字段中的“编辑”链接，选择“专攻”话题 - 您可以最多选择5个“专攻”话题，这将指导与这些话题相关的患者和问题到您的个人资料。（在这里查看更多关于“专攻”话题）

trans-unit.source: Add a professional looking "head and shoulders" photo to your Virtual Practice home page.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个包括“头和肩膀”照片到您的在线诊疗主页。

trans-unit.source: Start adding content to your profile by answering questions from users that interests you - this is the number 1 way to start generating traffic to your profile. Share the answers on FB and Twitter by selecting the appropriate channel after completing the answer. This can also be done from the "settings" link on the Virtual Practice home page.
trans-unit.target: 通过回答您感兴趣的用户的问题，开始向您的个人资料添加内容 - 这是开始为您的个人资料产生流量的第1种方式。在完成回答后可以通过选择相应的渠道在FB和Twitter上分享回答。这也可以通过在线诊疗主页上的“设置”链接完成。

trans-unit.source: Build your network of patients and colleagues. Your network size directly impacts your online reputation by attracting the attention of more specialists who will read and "Agree" with your answers - and patients who will "Thank" you. It also helps optimize your visibility to internet search engines. Recent analysis of our top doctors showed a direct correlation between network size and number of “Agrees” and "Thanks". (click here to invite colleagues or patients).
trans-unit.target: 建立您的患者和同事网络。您的网络规模直接影响您的在线声誉，通过吸引更多专科医生的注意，他们将阅读和“同意”您的回答 - 和“谢谢”您的患者。它也可以助于优化您的互联网搜索引擎的可见性。最近对我们的顶级医生的分析显示网络规模与“同意”和“谢谢”数量之间存在直接的相关性。（点击这里邀请同事或患者）。

trans-unit.source: Once you have started to contribute to the site, send us an email with your CV and interesting facts about your career and we will feature you in our very popular blog.
trans-unit.target: 当您开始在网站做出贡献，可以通过邮箱给我发送您的简历和关于您的职业生涯有趣的事实，我们将在我们非常受欢迎的博客中精选您的事迹。

trans-unit.source: Your points benefit you in many ways. The more points you collect, the higher your level and the more visible you'll be to prospective patients and referring colleagues. Every doctor starts at “certified”, but you will quickly start to advance to more prestigious levels.
trans-unit.target: 您的积分在很多方面会给您带来优势。您获得的积分越多，您的级别就越高，您对潜在患者和推荐同事的可见性也就越高。每名医生开始“认证”，但您会很快开始提高到更高的声望等级。

trans-unit.source: Access trusted health information, all approved by doctors so you can check out symptoms, conditions and treatments.
trans-unit.target: 访问值得信任的健康信息，所有医生批准的，以便您可以检查症状，病症和治疗方法。

trans-unit.source: See your hospital specialist without leaving home, book an appointment and see your health record.
trans-unit.target: 不离开家即可以查看您的医院专科医生，预订预约并查看您的健康记录。

trans-unit.source: Cloud-base service held at the highest security level. You control which clinicians are part of your care team.
trans-unit.target: 最高安全级别的基于云的服务。您控制哪些临床医生是您的医护团队的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Send a direct text message or a clinical photo to a healthcare professional.
trans-unit.target: 向健康医护专业人员发送直接的文字信息或临床照片。

trans-unit.source: Access individualised answers, news, and tips created by doctors based on the patient’s proprietary Health Graph and aggregate data.
trans-unit.target: 访问医生根据患者的专有健康图表和汇总数据创建的个性化回答，新闻和小贴士。

trans-unit.source: Get links to helpful websites, tips, checklists and reminders.
trans-unit.target: 获得有帮助的网站，小贴士，清单和提醒的链接。

trans-unit.source: Be acknowledged as an expert and mentor in Virtual Care delivery.
trans-unit.target: 被公认为提供在线医护的专家和导师。

trans-unit.source: Give care from anywhere, at any time you choose, using any mobile device or personal computer.
trans-unit.target: 随时随地使用任何移动设备或个人计算机提供医护。

trans-unit.source: Get thousands of thank you notes and gain recognition from respected peers for helping millions worldwide with your trusted expertise.
trans-unit.target: 用您值得信任的专业知识帮助全世界数百万的人，获得成千上万的感谢信和受尊敬的同行的认可。

trans-unit.source: Make it more convenient for patients by preventing long journeys to hospital, give everyone access to timely care, help patients manage their own health more effectively.
trans-unit.target: 避免进入医院的长途行程，使患者更加方便，让每个人获得及时的医护，帮助患者更有效地管理自己的健康。

trans-unit.source: Earn unlimited free AMA PRA Category 1TM CME credits while sharing knowledge with colleagues and patients.
trans-unit.target: 获得无限制免费的AMA PRA类别1TM CME信用，同时与同事和患者分享知识。

trans-unit.source: Share HIPAA-compliant secure messages with any doctor, or request Curbside Consult in any of 141 specialties.
trans-unit.target: 与任何医生分享HIPAA兼容的安全消息，或从任何141个专科中请求路边咨询。

trans-unit.source: Translate and share the knowledge of %{n} top doctors with your people

trans-unit.source: Increase their impact and reach a larger patient population
trans-unit.target: 增加他们的影响，并达到更多的患者人口

trans-unit.source: Seamless data inputs from all patients' engagements (from content browsing to labs and doctor consults).
trans-unit.target: 来自于所有患者参与的无缝数据输入（从浏览实验室到医生咨询的内容）。

trans-unit.source: Quickly triage all patients to proper and most cost-effective care and provide at the right care, at the right time and place, and at the right price.
trans-unit.target: 迅速将所有患者分流至适当和最优惠的医护，并在合适的时间和地点，以合适的价格提供合适的医护。

trans-unit.source: Fewer unnecessary readmissions, with in-person care reserved for necessary treatments. More capacity for better paying use cases and second opinions.
trans-unit.target: 减少不必要的再入院，为必要的治疗预留人工医护。使用案例和第二意见更好的支付能力。

trans-unit.source: Creates a vibrant patient and doctor community that deepens trust and long-term commitment to the provider and encourages referrals.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个活跃的医患社区，对提供者加深信任和长期承诺，并鼓励转诊。

trans-unit.source: A single secure sign-on (SSO) serves as your patients' and doctors' main interface for managing healthcare. Our safe and secure HIPAA-compliant, SOC 2 Type II-certified platform keeps data and consults confidential.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的安全登录（SSO）作为您的患者和医生的健康医护管理主界面。我们安全和可靠的HIPAA兼容，SOC 2 II型认证平台可以保持数据和咨询的机密性。

trans-unit.source: Operated by the provider's doctors and staff, integrating with EMRs and other existing provider services.
trans-unit.target: 由提供者的医生和工作人员操作，结合电子病历和其他现有服务。

trans-unit.source: Give peace of mind with engaging and delightful experiences. In addition, patients receive priority access to customer support.
trans-unit.target: 提供放心和愉快的体验。此外，患者会有访问客服支持的优先权。

trans-unit.source: Healthier, happier, and more compliant patients as well as improved health outcomes.
trans-unit.target: 更健康，更快乐和更符合要求的患者以及改善的健康结果。

trans-unit.source: Advanced data and analytics tools and dashboards helps analyze utilization and trends, enabling predictive analysis of health insights within patient population.
trans-unit.target: 高级数据和分析工具和仪表板有助于分析利用率和趋势，从而对患者群体中的健康见解进行预测性分析。

trans-unit.source: Build a visionary global brand and become a thought leader committed to delivering the best care possible.
trans-unit.target: 建立一个富有远见的全球品牌，成为一个思想领袖，致力于提供最好的医护。

trans-unit.source: Cloud-based platform requires no hardware or software installation.
trans-unit.target: 基于“云”的平台不需要硬件或安装软件。

trans-unit.source: Continuously updated and available across operating systems (Windows, Mac OS X, Android, and iOS) for patients and doctors.
trans-unit.target: 为了患者和医生有持续更新和可跨操作系统使用的（Windows，Mac OS X，安卓和iOS）。

trans-unit.source: Easy, immediate access to the provider’s high-quality doctors and their knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 轻松，立即访问提供者的高质量医生和他们的知识。

trans-unit.source: Available anytime, anywhere from any mobile device or personal computer.
trans-unit.target: 可随时随地使用任何移动设备或个人电脑。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap guides patients to the right care at the right time and at the right cost.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap指导患者在合适的时间和合理的花费下获得合适的医护。

trans-unit.source: No more waiting rooms: Patients can explore doctor-created and curated content, immediately connect with primary care doctors, and schedule virtual appointments with specialists.
trans-unit.target: 再没有候诊室：患者可以探索医生创建与监管的内容，与普通门诊医生立即取得联系，并安排与专科医生的在线预约。

trans-unit.source: Patients have access to individualized content (answers, tips, and more) based on their personal health record and HealthTap’s proprietary, data-driven Health Graph.
trans-unit.target: 患者可以基于他们的个人健康记录和HealthTap的专有的，数据驱动健康图像去个性化内容（答案，小贴士，以及更多）。

trans-unit.source: World-class, empathetic doctors are readily available, creating long-lasting relationships between the patient, doctor, and provider.
trans-unit.target: 世界级的，富有同情心的医生随时可以提供服务，在患者，医生和提供者之间建立长期持久的关系。

trans-unit.source: Whether it's the middle of the night or you're traveling out of the country, HealthTap doctors are here for you.
trans-unit.target: 无论是在半夜或出国旅行，HealthTap的医生都会为您服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime puts %{num} top doctors in your pocket—in under two minutes!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime把%{num}位顶级医生放入您的口袋&mdash；在两分钟内！

trans-unit.source: Doctors can order treatments and lab tests—sent to your local pharmacy or test center.
trans-unit.target: 医生可以订购治疗和实验室测试—发送到您当地的药店或测试中心。

trans-unit.source: Set your own prices and earn more than $2000/month by doing just one virtual consult a day.
trans-unit.target: 设置您自己的价格，仅需要一天完成一个在线咨询即可赚取超过2000美元/月。

trans-unit.source: Offer convenient, secure care that delights you and your patients by providing consults via live video, voice, or text from anywhere on any mobile device or computer.
trans-unit.target: 在任何地方任何移动设备或电脑通过实时视频，语音，或文字，提供方便安全的医护将使您和您的患者倍感舒心。

trans-unit.source: Fully integrated scheduling, prescriptions, lab orders, and test results. Ask us about EMR integration and help with insurance reimbursements.
trans-unit.target: 完全集成的计划，处方，实验室订购和测试结果。请咨询我们关于电子病历集成和帮助保险报销。

trans-unit.source: It’s simple. You choose your prices, and we empower you with an incremental revenue stream for your practice.
trans-unit.target: 这很简单。您选择您的价格，我们为您的诊疗赋予增量收入流。

trans-unit.source: Our team of experts will help you navigate your state’s parity laws (in most states) so you can get reimbursed.
trans-unit.target: 我们的专家团队将帮助您导航您所在州的平等法律（在大多数州），以便您可以得到报销。

trans-unit.source: Set a goal. Your personal Account Manager will help you get there with dedicated support for you and your practice.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个目标。您的个人帐户经理将帮助您为您和您的诊疗得到全力的支持。

trans-unit.source: Learn to navigate the software with short one-on-one training sessions, and get exclusive access to our proprietary Virtual Care resource center.
trans-unit.target: 短期一对一的培训课程学习操作软件的使用，并获得独家访问我们专有的在线医护资源中心的资格。

trans-unit.source: See your practice patients virtually and experience seamless integration with your practice (for certified EMRs).
trans-unit.target: 在线查看您诊疗的患者和与您诊疗经验的无缝衔接（为了认证的电子病历）。

trans-unit.source: Prescribe medication, which is automatically sent to any pharmacy, and seamlessly order and review lab tests via Quest Diagnostics.
trans-unit.target: 处方药将会被自动发送到任何药店，并通过Quest Diagnostics无缝订购和审查实验室测试。

trans-unit.source: Resell travel packages for 250% markup (or more)
trans-unit.target: 转售250％加价（或更多）的旅行套餐

trans-unit.source: Give clients peace of mind with ongoing virtual doctor care
trans-unit.target: 让客户放心的持续在线医生医护

trans-unit.source: For example, purchase a $6.99 package you can re-sell for $25 or more!
trans-unit.target: 例如，购买一个$6.99的套餐，您可以转售$25或更多！

trans-unit.source: To get started today, schedule a brief call with a Partner Specialist:

trans-unit.target: 您的HealthTap Prime免费试用订购已取消。除非您以后再次订购，否则不会向您收取HealthTap Prime的订购费用。

trans-unit.source: After the consult, you’ll be able to securely access the doctor’s summary on HealthTap, including any prescriptions, referrals, and checklists for you.
trans-unit.target: 咨询之后，您就可以安全地在HealthTap上访问医生的总结，包括为您的任何处方，转诊，和清单。

trans-unit.source: Doctors will also provide you with recommended actions or a checklist following you consult, reminding you what you can do.
trans-unit.target: 医生还会在您咨询后向您提供建议的行动或清单，提醒您可以做什么。

trans-unit.source: Reminders related to any recommended actions or any checklist provided to you by your doctor will automatically be sent to you by email and (if you have HealthTap on your mobile device) mobile notification.
trans-unit.target: 您的医生给您提供的任何建议或任何相关的清单会自动通过电子邮件（如果在您的移动设备中安装有HealthTap）和移动通知发送给您。

trans-unit.source: These reminders are tailored to you and your consult. They may contain information related to treatments and medications (including prescriptions) and other personal health-related information specific to your virtual consult. You can opt out of receiving these notifications by email or your mobile device at any time
trans-unit.target: 这些提醒是专为您和您的咨询的定制的。它们可能包含与您在线咨询的相关治疗和药物（包括处方）和其他个人健康相关信息的信息。您可以在任何时候通过电子邮件或移动设备选择接收这些通知

trans-unit.source: Never use HealthTap Prime in an emergency situation. Always call %{emergency_number} or your local emergency service immediately if you think you may have an emergency.
trans-unit.target: 切勿在紧急情况下使用HealthTap Prime。如果您认为有紧急情况，请随时拨打%{emergency_number}或呼叫当地紧急救援服务。

trans-unit.source: Don’t use HealthTap Prime if you have a serious injury or condition (such as chest pain, seizures, difficulty breathing, burns, or any critical or life-threatening situation. Also, don’t use HealthTap prime for mental, behavioral, or addiction issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有严重的损伤或病症（如胸痛，癫痫，呼吸困难，烧伤），或任何严重或危及生命的情况请不要使用HealthTap Prime。此外，不要对心理，行为和成瘾问题使用HealthTap Prime。

trans-unit.source: Checklists are a great way to stay engaged with your health. These checklists contain reminders about actions you can take to reach health goals, manage health conditions, and feel good.
trans-unit.target: 清单是一个为您保持健康的好帮手。这些清单包括您可以采取达到健康目标行动的提醒，管理健康状况，并Feel Good。

trans-unit.source: Marking actions as “complete” gives doctors important information for your next Virtual Consult. They'll know how to better tailor your treatments based on the actions you’ve taken in the past.
trans-unit.target: 标记行动为“完成”可以为您的下一次在线咨询向医生提供重要信息。他们可以根据您过去的行动来更好地调整您的治疗方法

trans-unit.source: When you subscribe to a checklist, you’ll automatically receive reminders via email and push notification. Of course, you can always opt out of these reminders at any time.
trans-unit.target: 当您订购一份清单后，您会自动收到通过电子邮件和推送发来的提醒。当然，您随时可以选择停用这些提醒。

trans-unit.source: When you subscribe to a checklist, we'll send you the reminders you see in the checklist by email and, if you have the HealthTap mobile app, by push notification. You control what reminders are sent to you, and where they're sent. This ensures that reminders are truly useful to you.
trans-unit.target: 当您订购一份清单后，我们会向您发送电子邮件让您看到清单里的提醒，如果您有HealthTap的移动应用程序，也会收到推送通知。您可以控制发送给您的提醒以及发送到何处。这确保提醒对您真正有帮助。

trans-unit.source: You control the utility, and the privacy, of the reminders you receive.

trans-unit.source: to make it meaningful, answerable, and easy to understand.
trans-unit.target: 使问题更有意义，可被答复并简单易懂。

trans-unit.source: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.
trans-unit.target: 问题必须是英文形式、容易理解，并且是关于健康或保健话题的。

trans-unit.source: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn’t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.
trans-unit.target: 问题必须包含足够的细节才是有意义和可回答的。命名一个话题（例如，“头痛？”）而不询问具体的东西，不给医生准确地回答的足够信息。您可以考虑提到有影响的性别，持续时间，年龄范围或身体区域。

trans-unit.source: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication. Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.
trans-unit.target: 不同国家的药物使用不同的名称，因此请务必包括药物的通用（仿制药）名称。我们的专家是拥有美国执业执照的医生，很少回答关于他们不熟悉的国外独特的药物，或他们没有访问的其他国家的医院或临床操作的问题。

trans-unit.source: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors’ names.
trans-unit.target: 不要包含您的姓名、其他人的姓名或医生的姓名。

trans-unit.source: We do not answer questions from minors under the age of 16, so parents should ask questions for teens and children.
trans-unit.target: 我们不回答未成年人提出的问题，所以父母需要为子女询问问题。

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little.Hide examples
Good:I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good:Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target:
更多的细节...至少有一点。隐藏范例
好：在过去3个星期里，为什么我的手肘内部一直瘙痒，从而导致干性皮疹？这可能由什么导致？
不太好： 为什么我有一个皮疹？

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.Show examples
Good:What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good:Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.target:
使（您的问题描述）尽可能长这样可以帮助到其他人。因为世界各地有成千上万的人可能会读您的问题和其相应的答案。显示范例
好： 是什么导致在家里做家务后会后背疼 - 我的背部从来没有受过伤？
不太好： 什么背疼？

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant.Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful:What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary:What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target:
当相关时，包括性别。显示范例
性别有帮助:什么可能导致男人胸部下面一个四分之一大小的肿块？
不需要性别：在我的手背皮肤上。这个类似橡胶凸起，果冻豆的大小的东西是什么？

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age.Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers:For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target:
包括一个适当的年龄。显示范例
不同的年龄段有不同的解答： 前两天，我15岁的儿子发烧了，而且走路一瘸一拐的，好像腿受了伤一样。哪些东西可能导致这种情况？
为什么前两天我3岁的孩子发着烧，走路还一瘸一拐，好像腿受了一样呢？使问题尽可能的对其他人是有帮助的。

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.Show examples
Good:My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good:My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target:
只要是相关的，包括体重、身高以及计量单位。显示范例
好：我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺。在他这个年龄这个身高体重正常吗？
不太好：我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺。在他这个年龄正常吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.Show examples
Good:My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good:My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target:
请同时使用药物的商标名和通用（仿制药）名称，尤其当您不在美国或问及不常见的药物时。显示范例
好：我5岁大的儿子，55磅，正在发烧。他服用5ml的泰诺（对乙酰氨基酚120mg / 5ml），但还在发烧。体重和年龄这么大的孩子可以服用更大剂量的泰诺吗？
不太好:我的儿子5岁，体重55，有一点发烧。已服用过泰诺但还在发烧。服用更多泰诺吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer.Show examples
Good:How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good:Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.target:
尽量避免提问一些医生回答“是”或者“不是”的问题。显示范例
好：抗生素如何在年幼的学龄儿童中起作用？
不太好：抗生素对儿童起作用吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out.Show examples
Good:Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good:Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target:
尝试不要留下意见显示范例
好： 为什么有些人会抵抗疫苗，明明疫苗可以用来预防疾病？
不太好：那些反疫苗的人是彻底地不懂还是只是拒绝接受？

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang.Show examples
Good:I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good:Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target:
越清楚越好。运用好语法，不要说脏话和俚语。显示范例
好：我当时正在锻炼手臂，然后感到二头肌处有火烧一样的疼痛。我是肌肉撕裂了吗？
不太好：做弯举，感觉不对和胳膊受伤？

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.Show examples
Good:My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good:And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target:
不要假设个人的病史知识。HealthTap的医生经常不会看到您以前的问题。显示范例
好： 我两岁的儿子两个月前得了耳管炎，现在还发烧了，右耳会流脓。这正常吗？
不太好： 这种症状已经持续两天，也一直有脓流出来吗？

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).Show examples
Good:I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good:Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target:
为了保护隐私，请不要留下您的姓名和他人的姓名（“其他”除已公开谈论某个问题的名人的名字）。显示范例
好：我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。在过去三年里有新的，好的治疗方法面世吗？
不太好： 您好，医生。我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.Show examples
Good:How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good:How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target:
避免使用太多的缩写，因为可能导致混淆显示范例
好：如果您没有来生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？
不太好：如果没有正常周期，是如何知道怀了？

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.Show examples
Good:I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good:Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.target:
用英语询问。这是HealthTap医生的常用语言。显示范例
好：我上周末修剪了一些树木，我的手臂已经疼了2天。这可能由什么引起？
不太好：Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
